Description: Pottery sherd from a cup. Dark slip inside and out with added white and orange painted bands on outside, and traces of white paint on inside.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Sir William Matthew Flinders Petrie
Bibliographic references: Vase / Catalogue of Vases in the British Museum (A556)
Kemp & Merrillees 1980 / Minoan Pottery in Second Millennium Egypt (Ka.14) (p. 65)
